name: clawshield
description: Private shielded transactions for AI agents on Solana via Zero-Knowledge proofs

scripts.postinstall: cp node_modules/@lightprotocol/hasher.rs/dist/hasher_wasm_simd_bg.wasm public/hasher_wasm_simd_bg.wasm || true && cp node_modules/privacycash/circuit2/transaction2.wasm public/circuit2.wasm || true && cp node_modules/privacycash/circuit2/transaction2.zkey public/circuit2.zkey || true
